overview: The year is 6th BC, many years had passed since Danielâ€™s prophecies, and most had forgotten the prophecies of a coming messiah. Mankind had strayed away from the god's way. Evil was prevailing. It was now time god will send his son to cleanse mankind to his sins. The prophecy was about to be fulfilled. Journey back to the holy land and witness the three epic events in the new testament- nativity, baptism & three temptations. Your kids will never be able to take their eyes off in this enthralling 3D adventure. Embark on an amazing visual treat watch the story of king of kings for the first time in 3D.
title: The Story of Jesus
